item.description: Meet at Farmington Canal in Cheshire at 11 am for a lovely walk. See the old gate locks that were used to raise and lower water level. This is a lovely area and a great place to spend a crisp winter day. Afterward, weâ€™ll go nearby for a delightful lunch. No charge for walk, you buy lunch. For info, call Art 860-426-8122. Directions: Rt. 84W Exit 29 (left exit, Rt. 10 Milldale), end of ramp turn right onto Rt. 10S, go 5.5 miles (thru Cheshire center), turn right at Cornwall Avenue, go 3/4 miles to 2nd stop sign, go straight, parking on left near path.
item.how_to_find_us: Art will be waiting for you in the parking lot.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk and Lunch
